title: Lesson 1
description: Understand the fundamental geography and administrative identity of Vienna.
content: Vienna, the capital of Austria, is located in the eastern part of the country on the Danube River. It is unique among Austrian states because it serves as both the nation's capital and a federal province in its own right. Known for its high quality of life, the city is divided into 23 districts, with the first district (Innere Stadt) serving as the historic heart and a UNESCO World Heritage site.

questions.prompt: On which major river is Vienna located?
How many districts (Bezirke) make up the city of Vienna?
What is the name of the central 1st district of Vienna?
